attributes.action: Department for Education make these three books required reading to all students
attributes.additional_details:
1. "The fourth part of the Institutes of the laws of England : concerning the jurisdiction of courts"  Sir Edward Coke
https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/010428878

2. "Precedents of proceedings in the House of Commons :
with observations" John Hatsell
https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/103044230

3. "Erskine May's Treatise on the law, privileges, proceedings, and usage of Parliament" Sir Barnett Cocks
https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/001145484

Please evaluate & sign this petition
attributes.background:
We simply request that the following three books and enactments be included in the national curriculum for all public schools, Police colleges, University Law courses and Judicial College within Royal Courts of Justice. 

A. Observation of Due process of Law 1368

B. 1688 Bill of Rights
